title_result: FIELD HEARING OF THE HOUSE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE SUBJECT: "SHOULD MEXICO HOLD VETO POWER OVER U.S. BORDER SECURITY DECISIONS?" CHAIRED BY: REPRESENTATIVE JAMES SENSENBRENNER (R-WI) WITNESSES: SHERIFF LEO SAMANIEGO, EL PASO COUNTY, TEXAS; ALISON SISKIN, SENIOR ANALYST, CONGRESSIONAL RESEARCH SERVICE; ANDREW RAMIREZ, CHAIRMAN, FRIENDS OF THE BORDER PATROL; RICHARD WILES, CHIEF, EL PASO POLICE DEPARTMENT; KATHLEEN WALKER, PRESIDENT-ELECT, AMERICAN IMMIGRATION LAWYERS ASSOCIATION LOCATION: CHAMIZAL THEATER, EL PASO, TEXAS
